author: potuz
content:
These are the images:

gcr.io/prylabs-dev/prysm/validator:HEAD-11fd5cb
gcr.io/prylabs-dev/prysm/beacon-chain:HEAD-11fd5cb

 you will need --delay-block-broadcast=2s
      - --use-rlnc
   
In the beacon (the former is so that you know that block production is not being counted as part of broadcasting) 

And in the vc
      - --use-rlnc

The vanilla non RNLC version is without the use-rlnc flags
